Description:
JAVA developer. for a leading bank in Riyadhrelated banking experience in Java Development roll not less than yearsPlease find below the key Responsibilities we are looking for: Core Java/JEE development skills and understanding of Java design principles

WebSphere 8.5 & 9, MS SQL Server
JSP, JavaScript, and JQuerySkills
Skills:
Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate).
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Well-versed in Java frameworks and related JEE internals, including, but not limited to, Exception Handling, Memory Management, Class Loading and Transaction Management.

Please find below the key skills we are looking for:

Strong core Java/JEE development skills and understanding of Java design principles
Experience in developing web applications using Spring MVC, Angular and Hybrid Mobile framework.
Excellent knowledge of WebSphere 8.5 & 9, MS SQL Server
Experience in the following technologies: JSP, JavaScript, and JQuery
Excellent problem-solving and production troubleshooting skill
Ability to work well under pressure and time constraints
Excellent written and verbal communication including technical writing skills.

Familiar with Mobile Native application technology and frameworks
Demonstrate good understanding of all phases of the development lifecycle.
Experience in Internet banking applications including Web and Mobile.
